snippet: Iran has stepped up surveillance along its long border with Iraq in precaution against a spread of violence from militants who have siezed a swathe of its neighbor, a senior official said on Monday....

headline.print_headline: Iran Boosts Security Along Iraq Border Over ISIL Advance: IRNA
headline.main: Iran Boosts Security Along Iraq Border Over ISIL Advance: IRNA

lead_paragraph: Iran has stepped up surveillance along its long border with Iraq in precaution against a spread of violence from militants who have siezed a swathe of its neighbor, a senior official said on Monday.
